resources.string: Hey, check out WompWomp. It has really funny videos and pictures: http://wompwomp.co/install
Hope you\'re enjoying our app. Share it with your friends!
We\'d love to have your feedback. Rate us on the Play store
Made with love in the USA
We tried but were not able to share the image for some reason
To share pictures and videos to other apps wompwomp needs permission to write files to your device.

string-array.name: loading_messages
string-array.item: Bringing you funny content from Antarctica…
Loading best content from the Voyager mission
Today\'s content is sponsored by emperor penguins…
Carrier pigeons bringing content to you…
Delivery vehicle is reentering the earth\'s atmosphere…
Waiting for popping to stop before opening the microwave…
Waiting a few epochs before we take stuff out of the oven…
Waiting on kittens to approve today\'s content…

resources.string: Get the new version of the app
Video not yet ready for sharing. Please try again shortly.
